name: Character Maker QR
first_mes:
##Installation Instructions (Automated) 1. Create a empty Persona named user 2. Copy and paste this script into the chat box and press enter. ```script /qr-set-create CMC Temp| /fetch https://raw.githubusercontent.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/refs/heads/Fetch-Files/SillyTavern%20Character%20Maker/Install/Check%20LALib.md| /qr-create set="CMC Temp" label="Character maker install script" {{pipe}}| /qr-update set="CMC Temp" label="Character maker install script" title="A script that will walk you through the setup."| /:"CMC Temp.Character maker install script"| /wait 100| /reload-page| ``` 3. Follow the Instructions 4. Press the "New Character" button.

For manual installation see Greeting 2 -->

!! Warning !!
‚ö†Ô∏è This character card is designed to be used only with SillyTavern.

Due to the included prompt structure and lorebook entries, it will generate very large characters (typically between 3000‚Äì9000 tokens).

Using this card outside SillyTavern is not recommended and will not work.
Notice
üí° Please give me feedback on chub.ai or on discord.
This will help make the characters better and keep me motivated.
Join the Character Creator Discord
creatorcomment:
!! Warning !!
‚ö†Ô∏è This character card is designed to be used only with SillyTavern.

Due to the included prompt structure and lorebook entries, it will generate very large characters (typically between 3000‚Äì9000 tokens).

Using this card outside SillyTavern is not recommended and may cause issues.
Notice
üí° I'm looking for help in converting the generated character cards to make better use of Lorebook entries.
This will help significantly reduce the permanent token count of complete characters.
If you have experience with Lorebook optimization and would like to contribute, your help would be greatly appreciated!
‚öôÔ∏è Technical
Model
Dans-PersonalityEngine-V1.1.0-12b
~2.7 GB System Memory / ~11.7 GB Video Memory
EsotericSage-12B.i1-Q6_K
~4.1 GB System Memory / ~11.4 GB Video Memory
Tested on a system with 32gb System Memory and 16gb Video Memory But as these are in the 'GGUF' format if you have less Video Memory it will use more System Memory instead but become slower but should work.
KoboldCPP Settings (Model Name - Context Size)
Dans-PersonalityEngine - 20480 EsotericSage - 20480
‚ÑπÔ∏è To download a settings file: Right-click the button and choose ‚ÄúSave link as‚Ä¶‚Äù.
‚ÑπÔ∏è You will probebly need to change the location of the model if you are not using ‚ÄúD:\KoboldCPP‚Äú as the location of your models.
Notes
The prompts are made to work with these two models but you can try it with your favorite model. All prompts are exposed as Lorebook entries. If you run into problems with prompts or want to contribute, join the Discord server (under construction but working).
Join the Character Creator Discord
All content is AI-generated and edited by @Drago87

data.creator: DrDrago87
alternate_greetings:
Installation Guide

Required Downloads

Lorebooks that is need for the Scripts to work. Download all .json file from [General Lorebooks](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/tree/Fetch-Files/SillyTavern%20Character%20Maker/LoreBooks/General) CMC Questions.json (Needed) CMC Rules.json (Needed) CMC Static Variables.json (Needed) CMC Templates.json (Needed) CMC Variables.json (Needed) CMC Guides.json (Optional) Contains information on how to edit and customize the Prompts. Then you need to download the files for [dans-personalityengine-v1.1.0-12b-q6_k](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/tree/Fetch-Files/SillyTavern%20Character%20Maker/LoreBooks/dans-personalityengine-v1.1.0-12b-q6_k) or [EsotericSage-12B.i1-Q6_K](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/tree/Fetch-Files/SillyTavern%20Character%20Maker/LoreBooks/EsotericSage-12B.i1-Q6_K) depending on the LLM model you are going to use. CMC Generation Prompts Model Name (Needed) CMC Information Model Name (Needed) ---

Quick Reply Sets

Download all files from [Quick Reply Scripts](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/tree/Fetch-Files/SillyTavern%20Character%20Maker/QR%20Sets) CMC Generate.json (Needed) CMC Logic.json (Needed) CMC Main.json (Needed) This needs to be added to **Chat Quick Reply Sets** and Visible (The checkbox to the right) CMC Automate.json (Optional) If added this needs to be in **Global Quick Reply Sets** and Hidden. This hides the CMC specific button when switching to another character and makes them visible when switching back ---

Required External Downloads

[LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) required for Character Maker scripts to work (Needed) ---

Optional Downloads

[SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) Addon for SillyTavern to see variables that are in use. (Recommended for debugging) To debug type '/setvar key=deby Yes' in chat. This let you see all variables that are used and if something is wrong you can probably find it here. a broken var usually looks likt this '{{something}}'. (This "button" empties all local variables that this cards buttons makes) --- For best result use a Empty Persona named user Start by pressing the QR button "New Character"
